short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intuitive and versatile, easily store important links for quick access!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never forget an important link again with this to-do list for links! Intuitive and versatile, save and revisit links without wading into a cluttered Bookmarks folder.

-Ability to save current tab with one click.
-Or manually save a link by using the Save Contact button. 
-Delete individual links you no longer need.
-Delete all will allow the user to clear all the links instantly.
-Data will be stored locally on the user's own computer.
